mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT C."hihokenshaNo",C."taishoNendo",MAX(C."rirekiNo") AS "rirekiNo" FROM rgdb."DbT3170JigyoKogakuGassanJikoFutanGaku" AS C WHERE C."isDeleted" = FALSE GROUP BY C."hihokenshaNo",C."taishoNendo",C."shikyuShinseishoSeiriNo") AS A INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT3170JigyoKogakuGassanJikoFutanGaku" AS B ON A."hihokenshaNo" = #{被保険者番号} AND A."hihokenshaNo" = B."hihokenshaNo" AND A."taishoNendo" = B."taishoNendo" AND A."rirekiNo" = B."rirekiNo" AND B."isDeleted" = FALSE ORDER BY B."hihokenshaNo" DESC, B."taishoNendo" DESC, B."hokenshaNo" DESC, B."shikyuShinseishoSeiriNo" DESC, B."rirekiNo" DESC

SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT C."hihokenshaNo",C."taishoNendo",MAX(C."rirekiNo") AS "rirekiNo" FROM rgdb."DbT3070KogakuGassanJikoFutanGaku" AS C WHERE C."isDeleted" = FALSE GROUP BY C."hihokenshaNo",C."taishoNendo",C."shikyuShinseishoSeiriNo") AS A INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT3070KogakuGassanJikoFutanGaku" AS B ON A."hihokenshaNo" = #{被保険者番号} AND A."hihokenshaNo" = B."hihokenshaNo" AND A."taishoNendo" = B."taishoNendo" AND A."rirekiNo" = B."rirekiNo" AND B."isDeleted" = FALSE ORDER BY B."hihokenshaNo" DESC, B."taishoNendo" DESC, B."hokenshaNo" DESC, B."shikyuShinseishoSeiriNo" DESC, B."rirekiNo" DESC
